bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Guide for Evaluating the Effect of Solar Radiation on Outdoor Metal-Enclosed Switchgear
Corrigendum 1
IEEE Approved Draft Guide for Evaluating the Effect of Solar Radiation on Outdoor Metal-Enclosed Switchgear - Corrigendum 1

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum corrects an error where the user of this document was directed to gather the wrong column information from the NOAA website for use in calculations. The document erroneously directs the user to read from the monthly normal average temperature values from the website rather than the monthly normal maximum temperature values.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.24-2017 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.24-2003)
